alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 9:21PM EST until December 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches for a storm total of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Northern Piscataquis, Northern Penobscot and Central Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis
